## Source: amazon-inspector (2da60b6c513002dadf0ea32c3293c0c1f0e73d8db20f85baf9b207fff1311569)
The package unified11 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (eda3f5f03cef0c612b0168424f40b8f3c9c8a79bec6e192bb96e8c51c0d67761)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'unified11' @ 10.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
